title: Buddy Hasn't Played in 2 Years ; 5 Min Punishment Timer for Bot Games
body:
^

Buddy is trying to get back into League after 2 years, never played PVP I dont think, definitely didn't dodge from what it sounds like, and we are getting a 5 minute restriction / punishment trying to get into a 3v3 PvAI game and we have 3 people so it should be instantaneous.....

 Does he need to submit a ticket or can something be figured out here?

replies.body: I had to do a little digging but I think I found the game and friend you were talking about. It looks like in the recent 3v3 games you've played, there was actually someone in your group that had a low priority queue. Since they had an LPQ, everyone in the group would have needed to wait.

Yessir, my buddy was the one with the LPQ and he hasnt played in 2 years. I helped him submit a ticket but we still arent sure why he had it in the first place. I'll check back in when I hear from his ticket. 

I dont think he dodged games so I just thought it was really weird and wasnt sure how to get rid of the restriction. Thanks for looking into this. We appreciate it.
